about.title: About Me
about.description: Full Stack Developer with demonstrated experience in architecting and developing modern web applications using React and Next.js. Specialized in designing and implementing SQL and NoSQL databases (MySQL, Firebase, MongoDB) in both cloud and on-premise environments. I have led e-commerce projects, real estate management systems, corporate landing pages, and report automation solutions, always prioritizing user experience, performance, and development best practices.

job1.description: Complete development of e-commerce website for dairy company using WordPress and WooCommerce. Implementation of customized product catalog, optimized shopping cart, and responsive design. Development of custom plugins including Spectra Advanced Visual Editor for page editing, secure checkout system with integrated payment methods (credit card, debit card, and other options), and advanced transaction management. Integration of Google Shopping and Google Ads to maximize visibility. Complete SEO optimization to improve search engine rankings. Implementation of security measures against spam (Akismet Anti-Spam) and data protection. Deployment and configuration on Hostinger server with performance optimization.

job2.description: Development of complete web application for procedure registration and control using full-stack architecture. Backend with RESTful API in NestJS with TypeScript, implementing JWT authentication middleware for robust security. User and role management with MongoDB (Mongoose) for granular access control. Frontend built in React, integrating Tailwind CSS for 100% responsive design and modern interface system. Development of automated reporting system: dynamic report generation in real-time with pagination and sorting, PDF export with dynamic template design and automatic generation, Excel (XLSX) export with configurable files and numeric formats. Integration of Chart.js for analytical data visualization with interactive charts. Implementation of dynamic forms with client and server-side validations, role-based permission system for load and access operations, and user management with password encryption (bcrypt) and secure storage. Dependency injection with NestJS for scalable and maintainable architecture.

job3.description: Design and development of full-stack architecture for real estate management web application. Backend with REST API and business logic in NestJS with TypeScript, frontend SPA with React and Tailwind CSS. Implementation of dynamic property catalog with advanced search filters, optimized visualization, and efficient pagination. Integration of interactive map using Leaflet with geolocation for precise property location. Data consumption and cache management with React Query for optimized searches and better performance. Implementation of image and file upload and management with Firebase Storage. Advanced SEO optimization to improve search engine visibility. Configuration of efficient queries, client-side pagination with response times through efficient queries. Social media integration for lead generation and client communication. Domain acquired on Hostinger and site deployment on Vercel for high availability and performance.
